title: Bubble Explode - Android Wear
summary: Take Bubble Exploding experience to the next level with beautiful animations
developerAddress:
Spooky House Studios UG (haftungsbeschränkt)
Otto-Schmidt-Str. 9
04425 Taucha, Germany
description: Take your Bubble Exploding experience to the next level with nice animations, bonuses, global online scoreboards, original game modes and much more!Bubble Explode has been Top 1 free iPhone App in UK, Canada, Netherlands, Russia and has been in Top 5 free apps in USA, Australia, Germany, France, Italy, Spain and many other countries!Features:- Chain reaction bubble Explosions- Slick animations- 10 game modes: Classic, Chill Out, Bubble Invasion, Bubble Shootix, Swapper, Power of Two, Critical Mass, Turn By Turn, Gravity and Classic Blitz.- Bonuses for exploding bubble groups of nice shapes: squares, lines, corners, etc…- Colored and Black & White skins included- Online Scores by Scoreloop!
descriptionHTML:
Take your Bubble Exploding experience to the next level with nice animations, bonuses, global online scoreboards, original game modes and much more!

Bubble Explode has been Top 1 free iPhone App in UK, Canada, Netherlands, Russia and has been in Top 5 free apps in USA, Australia, Germany, France, Italy, Spain and many other countries!

Features:
- Chain reaction bubble Explosions
- Slick animations
- 10 game modes: Classic, Chill Out, Bubble Invasion, Bubble Shootix, Swapper, Power of Two, Critical Mass, Turn By Turn, Gravity and Classic Blitz.
- Bonuses for exploding bubble groups of nice shapes: squares, lines, corners, etc…
- Colored and Black & White skins included
- Online Scores by Scoreloop!
comments: Great games vs crashes & battery life. With ELEVEN different games in one (Twelve ironically being my favorite) is my go to game to play on my Moto360, even over many phone games. Fast battery drain, though probably unavoidable, is a big issue and certain games like swapper have been prone to crashes for me. 4.5 stars.
Had to uninstall because of a storage issue but when I've re installed it it downloads but there's no open button just an uninstall button so I can't even open it! It used to be my favourite!
Installed and then cannot open..not even have the option to do so...on my S5 neo
Awesome app Keeps me entertained for hours.
